appName: Death Game Hotel, a White Owls® game
displayName: Death Game Hotel, a White Owls® game
display_name: Death Game Hotel, a White Owls® game
display_long_description:
Welcome, brave guest, to Death Game Hotel, where the stakes are deliciously grim and the games are always hungry for more. 

 
Take a seat at the most twisted poker table imaginable, where wagers go far beyond mere currency. Hands, eyes, and ears are all fair game. A mysterious new “death” suit dominates the deck, and any weak hand may cost more than pride. 

 
[media]


The horrors, and thrills, don’t stop there. Another sinister challenge awaits: Goblet of the Reaper. Drop stone slabs into an overflowing goblet; push it too far and face the Reaper. 

 

[media]

 

Battle it out with up to six other doomed guests in chaotic multiplayer lobbies, or brave the solo tournament, where eccentric challengers will do anything to survive. 

 

Cheating? Entirely acceptable. Encouraged, even. Anything goes, so long as no one notices the tricks. 



📢 Stay Updated

DISCORD: 
https://discord.com/invite/deathgamehotel

X: 
https://x.com/WhiteOwlsInc

Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/whiteowlsinc/

Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/WhiteOwlsInc
